news.title: G Square Group acquires five acres land worth ₹300 crore in Madurai from TVS Group's owners
news.para: G Square Group has secured a five-acre land parcel in Madurai for ₹300 crore. The land, formerly owned by the TVS Group founder, will be transformed into G Square Temple View Square. This project will feature 55 plots, including residential and commercial spaces.

news.title: Keystone Realtors' net profit decline 83.06% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Keystone Realtors reported a drop of more than 83% in net profit for the quarter ending December 31, 2025, with earnings post-tax dwindling to ₹5.08 crore from ₹29.98 crore the previous year. The company also faced nearly a 40% downturn in total income.

news.title: Aptus Value Housing Finance India's net profit rises 23.98% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Aptus Value Housing Finance India announced its quarterly results for the period ending December 31, 2025, showcasing a 23.98% rise in net profit. The company's total income followed suit, enjoying a significant uptick.

news.title: Century Plyboards (India) net profit up 10.56% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Century Plyboards' net profit saw a growth of over 10 percent in the quarter ending December 31, 2025.  Looking ahead, the company is set to significantly expand its manufacturing capabilities.  Major investments are planned for both plywood and MDF production. These expansions are expected to be completed by 2029.

news.title: Rivers, groundwater under threat as STPs in societies fall into disuse in Pune & Pimpri Chinchwad
news.para: Rivers in Pune and Pimpri Chinchwad face severe pollution from untreated sewage. Inefficient sewage treatment plants are a major cause. A Bombay High Court order mandates occupancy certificates only for buildings with functional STPs. This issue impacts public health, as seen in past outbreaks. Authorities are urged to ensure accountability from builders, societies, and civic bodies to protect water sources.

news.title: Nexus Select Trust raises ₹7 billion via 10-year sustainability-linked bond
news.para: Nexus Select Trust has secured ₹7 billion from a 10-year sustainability-linked bond issuance. The International Finance Corporation is the anchor investor. This issuance will help refinance existing debt, leading to significant interest savings. The bonds are linked to ambitious sustainability targets, including net-zero emissions by 2030.

news.title: Chandigarh administration amends paying guest policy
news.para: Chandigarh's PG policy now mandates completion certificates for registration, ending conditional approvals.  Residential properties must be sanctioned and free of unauthorized construction post-certificate. Occupation certificates are now a requirement, with no grace period for pending documents.

news.title: Uttar Pradesh housing board generates ₹1,000 crore through new scheme
news.para: The UP Awas Vikas Parishad has generated Rs 1,000 crore in revenue through its first-come-first-served scheme, launched in October last year to sell unsold housing units. The scheme, which offers discounts for early payments, has seen 2,141 flats booked and will continue until March 31.

news.title: YEIDA razes illegal colony, clears 25 acres land near Noida international airport
news.para: The Yamuna Expressway Industrial Development Authority (YEIDA) has reclaimed 25 acres of land, valued at Rs 400 crore, from encroachers developing unauthorized housing projects near the upcoming airport. This action, which included demolishing illegal colonies and clearing roads, is part of a broader crackdown on land mafia exploiting the airport's development.

news.title: Greater Noida authority fines Ajnara Homes for a non-functional sewage treatment plant
news.para: Greater Noida Industrial Development Authority (GNIDA) fined Ajnara Homes Rs 50 lakh for a non-functional sewage treatment plant and discharging untreated sewage. The society also received a Rs 4 lakh penalty for poor solid waste management. Officials found the STP shut for two years, leading to sewage overflow and violations of NGT and pollution control board norms.

news.title: TREVOC Group, Canonicus Capital set up ₹500-crore platform for stalled housing projects in NCR
news.para: TREVOC Group and Canonicus Capital have partnered to launch a funding platform to complete residential projects nearing completion in the National Capital Region. The platform will initially deploy ₹125 crore, with plans to scale up to ₹500 crore.

news.title: Haryana to launch faceless property registration pilot from Faridabad
news.para: Haryana is launching a pilot faceless property registration system in Faridabad by the end of March. The system will be securely hosted on the Government of India's MeitY Cloud. A three-month pilot will assess its effectiveness before potential expansion to other districts.

news.title: Abu Dhabi's Mubadala wins 700 million euro arbitration on Signa losses
news.para: Abu Dhabi's Mubadala fund secured over 700 million euros in arbitration. This is linked to the Signa property empire's collapse. The arbitration targeted Rene Benko and core Signa entities. Investors seek to recover significant losses.

news.title: Singapore's GuocoLand to take Malaysian real estate arm private at $196 million valuation
news.para: GuocoLand, based in Singapore, plans to acquire all outstanding shares of its Malaysian subsidiary, GuocoLand (Malaysia). This deal values the Malaysian company at 770.5 million ringgit. The acquisition will lead to GuocoLand (Malaysia) being delisted from the Malaysian stock exchange.

news.title: DLF to sell IT/ITeS SEZ asset, land parcel in Kolkata to Srijan group entities for ₹670 crore
news.para: DLF has finalized the sale of its Kolkata IT/ITeS SEZ property along with an adjacent land parcel, valued at around ₹670 crore. The purchasers, Makalu Builders LLP and Gangapurna Projects LLP, both operating under Srijan Realty, are poised to wrap up the deal in the next four months.

news.title: CCI clears AXDI LDII SPV’s acquisition of 10% stake in Aadhar Housing Finance
news.para: The Competition Commission of India has greenlighted AXDI LDII SPV 1's purchase of a 10.04% share in Aadhar Housing Finance, marking an investment by the Abu Dhabi Global Market's special-purpose vehicle.

news.title: Kansai Nerolac Paints' net profit dips 82.33% in Q3 FY26
news.para: Kansai Nerolac Paints saw its net profit drop significantly by 82.33 percent in the quarter ending December 31, 2025. The company's profit after tax stood at ₹117.05 crore compared to ₹662.27 crore in the previous year. Total income rose slightly by 2.74 percent.

news.title: Signature Global posts net loss of ₹45.33 crore in Q3 FY26
news.para: Signatureglobal India reported a net consolidated loss of ₹45.33 crore for the quarter ending December 31, 2025. This marks a shift from a profit in the same period last year. The company's total income also saw a significant drop.

news.title: Hongkong Land launches $6.4 billion Singapore commercial property fund
news.para: Hongkong Land has launched its first private real estate fund. It is seeded with S$8.2 billion of Singapore commercial property assets. The company aims to grow the fund to at least S$15 billion. It targets $100 billion of assets under management by 2035.

news.title: India to host over 2,400 GCCs by 2030, market size to hit $110 billion: Report
news.para: By 2030, over 2,400 GCCs are expected in India, employing 2.8 million professionals. The market size will reach $105-110 billion. GCCs are the primary driver of office leasing in major cities. Bengaluru leads, with tier-II cities also emerging as growth hubs.
